entry.title: Static Site Generator
entry.content: My website is produced using the Octopress blogging framework, a static site generator that turns markdown into html pages, and is backed by a git repository. I can write a new post by simply pushing a new markdown file to the repository. I recommend Octopress as itâ€™s very convenient and nerd friendly!

entry.title: News Feature Now Active
entry.content: I just changed the blogging feature into a news section, and plan to submit news items via this channel. Sweet.
